column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Inorder to reduce the cost to under 6500, I have done the following changes
Storage amount reduced to 500 GB, for Quantity (2), of Amazon RDS for MySQLInstance type (db.m4.4xlarge)
Number of EC2 instances to run webservers and application servers reduced from 16 to 6
